headers.subject: [tosdr:1691] [Bad] Craigslist: Inability to delete posts or accounts.

subject: [Bad] Craigslist: Inability to delete posts or accounts.
text:
Asterisks added below for bolding. Original terms ("Last Updated: February 14, 2012") at: 
http://www.craigslist.org/about/terms.of.use

2. MODERATION

CL has the right … to regulate content ( … postings … accounts) … posted to … craigslist by any user … (including … *deletion* and/or *termination* of content, accounts …). … CL action or inaction to regulate content or conduct or to enforce against any potential violation of the TOU by any user … does not waive CL's right to implement or not implement regulation or enforcement measures with respect to any subsequent or similar content, conduct or potential TOU violation.

You … agree that any action or inaction by … CL … to … regulate content … is undertaken voluntarily … and you expressly agree that neither CL nor any CL Representative shall be liable to you … for any action or inaction to … regulate content, or to implement other enforcement measures against any content … .

Although CL Representatives may moderate content …, CL Representatives have no authority to make binding commitments … to anyone that they or anyone else on behalf of CL will "take care" of any alleged problem or complaint …. Accordingly, you … agree that any representation … by any CL Representative … that CL … would or would not … regulate content (including … *remove*, *terminate*, *delete* … any content), or to implement other enforcement measures against any content … is superseded by this provision and is nonbinding and unenforceable. Specifically, you agree that CL … shall in no circumstance be liable as a result of any representation that CL … would or would not restrict or redress any content …. This paragraph may not be modified, waived or released except by a written agreement, dated and signed by CL's Chief Executive Officer and dated and signed by the individual or entity to whom the modification, waiver or release is granted.

CL … has the right … to … discontinue all or any portions of craigslist at any time without notice. CL … shall not be liable for any such … discontinuance ….
